description:
Chan Tao was an Alliance enlisted serviceman. When Yang Wen-li was transferred to the Econia Internment Camp in November 788 UC, he was assigned as Yang`s orderly. By that time Chan Tao had been in the military for 35 years, and had spent that whole time in the enlisted ranks. He enjoyed his duties, saying "I haven`t had to shoot anyone or be shot by anyone."
Prior to the Second Battle of Tiamat, Chan Tao served as an orderly to Alliance war hero and Year 730 Mafia member admiral Wallace Warwick.
Gineipedia
name: Chan Tao
